data.title: Default B Long Arc Rose Control
data.description: When looking to take B Long control, default this flash to push Defenders back from immediate angles.

data.title: Full A Site + Art Steel Garden Execute
data.description: Use this Steel Garden lineup to successfully push Defenders back from the A Site, or Art.

data.title: Full B Site Steel Garden Clear + Link
data.description: To gain a simple advantage, use this Steel Garden lineup when your ultimate is up.

data.title: A Main to Art Razorvine Clear
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way to pressure Art at the start of the round.
